item.title: Connect Putty to Serial Port on VirtualBox guest using a Named Pipe
item.description: This post describes how to connect to the serial console to a VirtualBox guest VM using PuTTY. The serial console has traditionally played a special role in system configuration, administration and recovery. Access through this method may provide special elevated privileges and/or not have the same authentication requirements as access through other means. For the VirtualBox VM you wish to connect to, go to the serial port settings. * Enable the Serial Port and select the port number you want to connect to (ie, COM1) * Change the Port Mode to Host Pipe * Select Create Pipe * Enter the Port/File Path as \.
